name: MorningJournal
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: I hope you will enjoy this Morning Journal flash briefing. I am grateful for the opportunity to share observations and insights with you each weekday. You might also be interested in my weekly podcast, The Kindle Chronicles. Please feel free to leave a review and/or email me at podchronicles@gmail.com. Thanks for listening and have a great day!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
